name: MayoMatic
description:
Did you know that making a good mayonnaise is extremely hard?

Fortunately we have made this incredibly accurate mayonnaise cooking simulator for you!

This mini-game is part of the autobus project: [link coming soon]

 

In order to make to have the best result you will have to stay in the rhythm and simultaneously:

  • Whip the mayonnaise at  the perfect speed
  • Add the ingredient at the right moment

Controls :

/!\ It is only playable with a controller (and the hints use the xbox mapping but it works with other controllers)

  • Move the whip with the left joystick
  • Add ingredients by pressing the corresponding button when the ingredient in above the middle of the bowl (the letter turns white)

The team :

  • Altreon (website) - Prog
  • Alice Glémarec - Sound design and design
  • Pierrick “Kwakwaouaite” Pamart - Visual art, prog and design
